title: Major floods in the U.S. from 1900 to 2016 , by number of people affected
summary: This chart shows the Number of people made by Date, in a from 1900 .
\\n From the chart we see that the Jan_15_-_Jan_21_1996_Nevada_Arizona_New_Mexico Date, was the Major floods Date, in the 1900 with 11000148 people .

The next Date, to make the most people was the Jun_30_-_Jul_23_2002_New_Braunfels_Bandera Date, with 144000 people closely followed by the Dec_29_2008_-_Jan_16_2009_Orting_Chehalus Date, with 30000 people .

data.Date, Location: Aug 9 - Aug 16 2016 Louisiana Mississippi MissouriIllinois Indiana
Jan 15 - Jan 21 1996 Nevada Arizona New Mexico

gold: The statistic shows the major floods that have occurred in the United States from 1900 to 2016 , that affected the most people . Approximately 11 million people were affected by the flood that took place in June 2008 in the United States .
